create.prompt:
Use case: YouTube Shorts, 40-60s high-retention philosophy rap
Primary request: Payoff and CTA: seek knowledge, become light, continue the journey.
Scene/background: cosmic sunrise over abstract city skyline with mandala wave patterns
Subject: rising orb, concentric rings, final uplifting motion
Action: 0-4s orb rise with beat pulses; 4-8s rings synchronize with rhythm; 8-12s confident wide reveal ending on anticipation
Camera: vertical crane-up finish with fast cut accents and final hold
Lighting/mood: warm dawn mixed with neon edge highlights
Color palette: gold, deep blue, cyan, soft white
Style/format: contemporary inspirational trap visual, clean and cinematic
Audio: visual-only clip for external rap soundtrack
Constraints: under-18 suitable, no logos, no real people, no copyrighted characters
Avoid: on-screen text, watermark, blur artifacts
